Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
Our lecturers don't always have the time to spare in giving each and every one of us feedback, and our TA's and people who mark our assignments sometimes give us no feedback at all, let alone good feedback.

GenAI is a means to check myself to identify any points I missed at my own discretion, in my own time, on demand.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
Feelings don't matter. I'm here to in university to become good at what I do and in my field, not feel good while being terrible at my job.

Sometimes human teaching staff try so hard to be nice and offer no constructive criticism or feedback. they are objectively useless in that regard. GenAI is better.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI is capable of giving purely objective, truthful and indepth feedback while human teaching staff often cut corners as they have a lot of work and not enough time or incentive.
